About Us

  • Mage Brand Production and Marketing is one of the renown , well established and leading marketing agency in Pakistan for marketing and production of your prestigious Brand in Electronic , social , radio as well as both International and National Print media .

  • We advocate to Advertise/publish/Promote your prestigious brand through our Brand Marketing house with high esteem of it getting its recognization with marketability and popularity.

  • We connect over 114 countries largest employers/clients to some of the renowned TV Channels such as Hum TV Network , ARY Network , Geo Network, PTV Network, Samaa Tv , Duniya TV , Abb Takk TV , Jaag Tv , Masala Tv ,Health Tv , KTN Tv ,TVOne , ATV , Aj Tv nationwide in all sort of regions and areas.

  • Our marketplace can be used by a brand to do work/to get services in the areas of sales and marketing and production at National and International Level . Services regarding the Promotion of a Brand: ·Brand Endorsement throughout the transmission ·Logo appearance on Screen ·Product placement on the set ·Gifts distribution among guests ·Gift distribution announcement.
